name: Voice Break
description:
Our hero, deep in the throes of puberty, has experienced a major voice drop overnight! With his voice dropping deeper and deeper, it's up to you to help him avoid embarrassment as he navigates the uncomfortable social experiences of high school. Your skills will determine our hero's future. Will he turn out undamaged? Or will he be tormented by memories of his traumatic adolescence? Voice Break is a mashup of rhythm games and typing tools. You type the sentences that appear on the screen, but must do it in time to avoid cracking your voice. If your voice gets too high, you'll need to rapidly clear your throat to avoid more embarrassment.

Note*

There are issues going full-screen in Safari.

If the web version does not load, you can run the Windows executable below.
